entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 11:30 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: SE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
